Articles.Content:
Angels of Iron, I believe. But does that Marine actually need 4 Seals of Purity?

It\'s not my miniature, it\'s something from google images.

But apparently they do have quite a lot of purity seals.

It just means he was the only member of a combat squad who survived a battle. Each seal represents a lost Battle Brother.

(Oh gosh, I can\'t believe I\'m that much of a 40K geek . . )

Oh

I thought they were battle honours. >->

You, know, to prove you\'re actually fighting well on the side of the Imperium.

Spess Mareenz: Unbelievers to the Dark Gods

Spess Mareenz taym!

Grammar Nazi Mince is displeased

Oh

I thought they were battle honours. >->

You, know, to prove you\'re actually fighting well on the side of the Imperium.

It just means he was the only member of a combat squad who survived a battle. Each seal represents a lost Battle Brother.

(Oh gosh, I can\'t believe I\'m that much of a 40K geek . . )

They don\'t represent lost battle brothers, nor are they battle honours (although they may be awarded after a battle) A purity seal indicates that the person who owns it, or the armour that it is affixed to, is pure of mind, spirit, purpose and body. Essentially marking them fit for battle. Often containing an oath, or valediction of the wearers purity.

Who knows?

1.Does the warp offer access to other galaxies, or only our own?

2.Aren\'t chaos condemned to the eye of terror?

1. No, the warp is localised and limited to our own galaxy, it does not extend beyond our galaxy.

2. Not quite, although the Eye of Terror is the main focal point for daemonic incursions into the materium, Chaotic forces of a non daemonic nature (Traitor Astartes, Traitor Guard etc etc) are usually free to roam, although any forces stationed in the EoT have to breach the cadian gate in order to expand further.

God-Emperor > Horus

Imperium > Chaos

:3

Just wondering, have Chaos Forces attacked other galaxies?

No, because not only of the vast gulf of space between galaxies, but so far, galaxies are either dead, emptied by the Tyranids, or reportedly full of Orks.

They don\'t represent lost battle brothers, nor are they battle honours (although they may be awarded after a battle) A purity seal indicates that the person who owns it, or the armour that it is affixed to, is pure of mind, spirit, purpose and body. Essentially marking them fit for battle. Often containing an oath, or valediction of the wearers purity.

My chaplain with jump pack has 11 purity seals...

What does that make him?
A Jerk, lording it over his fellow marines with his collection.
Heh... one of my current projects is creating a sprite-mod for another game. It\'s all \'bout Wh40k.
I can\'t get this song out of my head D:
This has that song too, but without the background chatter.

I drew a mechanicus thing...

Perhaps something a techpriest might create to serve on the Holy Terra?

I drew a mechanicus thing...

Perhaps something a techpriest might create to serve on the Holy Terra?

I\'d probably use that. Looks like some sort of Servo Skull (without a skull), but more robotic.

I\'d probably use that. Looks like some sort of Servo Skull (without a skull), but more robotic.

Yeah, I can\'t draw skulls.

Or people.
Looks rather Tomb Spydery.

Yeah, I can\'t draw skulls.

Or people.

I can draw rubbish skulls and stickmen! So there!

So I just ordered this:

http://www.games-workshop.com/gws/catalog/productDetail.jsp?catId=cat440248a&prodId=prod1070077

:DDDDD

Next time I can buy something, It will definately be this.

http://www.games-workshop.com/gws/catalog/productDetail.jsp?catId=cat440207a&prodId=prod1160030a

Abbadon the Despoiler. Abbadon the Arch-Fiend. The clone-son of Horus himself. He tore the talon of horus off Horus\'s dead body and he uses it now. He also has the Drach\'nyen, which is just epic beyong description.

Abbadon has led 13 black crusades, each more devastating than the last.

He even nearly destroyed the imperial gate.

He is none other than the future destroyer of the imperium.

It is only a matter of time before he claims his true prize: Terra.

Dream on, Heretic.

It\'s only a matter of time until the Eldar are eradicated, then the Imperium can focus on other things more.

Dream on, Heretic.

It\'s only a matter of time until the Eldar are eradicated, then the Imperium can focus on other things more.

Come on Luigi, you know that Chaos will prevail.

All order shall be overthrown, leaving nothing but chaos and anarchy in its wake.

You\'ve had 10,000 years to prove it. :3

Has it yet? Nope.

EDIT 1337 POST

Like. A. Boss.

You\'ve had 10,000 years to prove it. :3

Has it yet? Nope.

Yeah, but... But...

Well, abbadon hasn\'t managed to unite all the chaos forces yet...

Please, if there\'s something called \'Chaos\' I doubt it can unite.

Also, read up to my previous post.
Considering it took an army of Ultramarines to destroy one demon prince...
Ultramarines are over-rated, though. Sure, a good few of them get great publicity, but without certain other chapters the Emperor would be dead, ie Imperial Fists for the defence of Terra.

Anyway, post a picture of your painting skills, everyone!

(trying to change topic away from Chaos vs. Imperium because that\'s a long, neverending argument.)

I\'ll post mine tomorrow, \'cause I have to go now.

I haven\'t painted anything yet. D:

My Dad has an army of Guard, and some Adaptus Astartes Ultra.
